00020 }
00021 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00022 int SpGlslFragmentProgram::getParameterRegister( const char* acName )
00023 {
00024     // get the current program handle, if there is one
00025     GLuint uiUserData = 0;
00026     getUserData(&uiUserData, sizeof(GLuint));
00027 
00028     // return if program has not been compiled
00029     if(!uiUserData)
00030         return -1;
00031 
00032     // request a uniform location to use as the register
00033     int iRegister = -1;
00034     iRegister = glGetUniformLocationARB( uiUserData, acName );
00035 
00036     // return the register index
00037     return iRegister;
00038 }
00039 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00040 bool SpGlslFragmentProgram::setParameter1i(
00041     const char* acName, int iX)
00042 {
00043     // get a register for the parameter
00044     int iRegister = getParameterRegister( acName );
00045     if(iRegister < 0) return false;
00046 
00047     // assign the parameter to the given register
00048     glUniform1iARB( iRegister, iX );
00049     return true;
00050 }
